contentrichtext.text: '''Jippi Comics''' is a [[Norway|Norwegian]] comics publisher, best known for their ongoing anthology "[[Forresten]]", and publishing the work of now famous [[Jason (comics)|Jason]] long before his international breakthrough. Started and run by the comic creators themselves, Jippi has been a catalyst in the Norwegian comics scene since the early 1990s, giving unknown artists a chance to show off their work to each other and the general public. Among the hundreds of artists published by Jippi are: [[Jens Styve]], [[Ronny Haugeland]], [[Sven Tvedt]], [[Tor Ærlig]], [[Flu Hartberg]], [[Inga Sætre]], Jason, [[Sindre Goksøyr]], Roy Søbstad, Jim Salabim, [[Marius Martinussen]], [[Odd-Henning Skyllingstad]], [[Øyvind Laudahl]] and [[Henry Bronken]]. == External links == * [http://www.jippicomics.com/english/index.html Jippi Comics official site] [[Category:Publishing companies of Norway]]
